programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.sub-title: A Dad, Tacos & the Kung Fu Kid
programme.desc: A man finds out his wife is having sex with their son-in-law; a man cheats with one of his girlfriend's best friends; a man suspects his girlfriend is cheating with his friend.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: A man cheats with his girlfriend's cousin; a man cheats on his wife with his ex-lover.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Tony is sleeping with his girlfriends best friend, Allen. Next Tammy’s fiancée, Ron, has no idea that she's been sleeping with her best friend, Autumn. Later Jan’s lovers, Russ and Ian, find out that Jan has yet another romantic interest in her life.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Kejana’s aunt Rose moved in with her and her man Dicoy. Dicoy ended up cheating with Rose! Can Ruben get Selena to leave his best friend Scott? Eddie had a fling with transsexual Chloe, but then his girlfriend’s father found out!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.sub-title: You're Pregnant by Him, but It Should Be Me
programme.desc: Becca wants to rekindle her relationship with her ex, who has a pregnant new girlfriend; best friends Cory, Jess and Juan find themselves in a love triangle; siblings Keimo and Keke learn that their significant others have hooked up.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Kiki taught Kat the ropes whens he started in the strip clubs and then they became lovers. But now Kat is dumping Kiki for a man! Later Cedric is here to tell his girlfriend that he wants to join him in a threesome with his secret lover, Eric!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Leon has nothing but contempt for his sister's girlfriend, but found himself doing an unthinkable act with her; Brenda fears that a romance with Erika could ruin their friendship; Jenny wants to confess a mistake to her sister.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Alex refuses to lose his ex-girlfriend without a fight; CeeCee needs to reveal her true identity to her online crush; Kyle and his sister have secrets to confess.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.sub-title: I'm Not His Cousin, I'm His Fiancee
programme.desc: Thomas' baby's mama and fiancee demand that he choose between them; Autumn reveals her true identity to a man who is interested in her; Alyse is blind-sided by her boyfriend's ruthless rejection.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: A transgender man has second thoughts about marrying a woman; Germaine wants his ex to take him back and reveals a secret; Stormie's husband gives her an ultimatum.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Reno has been dating Lavan for 6 months but has had a secret for the entirety of their relationship. Now Reno is ready to reveal that she is actually a woman, not a man.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: A woman is ready to give up nine years of marriage; a woman confronts her husband and his Internet lover.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Sarah's here for Jonathan. The only problem is Lana, her best friend, who just happens to be Jonathan's girlfriend. Next Kung-fu family feud! David's here to let his brother, Lil Wayne, know that he has been sleeping with his girlfriend Ashley.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Darleen's husband says he is addicted to strip clubs; Mary's boyfriend is obsessed with cleaning his car, and she suspects he is using it as cover for something else; Jesse's fear of commitment lands him in hot water.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Jake is here because he says that he knew he was in love with his girlfriend Lindsey the first time she ever asked him for a side of cheese. Then Shaina says she's in love with not one but two beautiful girls.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Tia says she has proof that her brother-in-law cheats on her sister; Maranda wants to get back together with her ex-fiance but believes it could stir up problems with her best friend; Kaila wants a threesome.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Morgan literally dumps his fiancé at the altar for his secret lover, Victor! Next, John is leaving his fiancé, Jamie, now that his ex-wife wants him back! Later Dave is furious with his niece because she is engaged to a man of a different race.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Freddie insists he wants to be with his wife and his days of hooking up with his ex-girlfriend are over; Carleeta devises a scheme she thinks will strengthen her bond with her sister; Shi's friend and boyfriend got to know each other better.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Shianne confronts the stripper she says is destroying her marriage; stripper Candy wants a threesome with her two female co-workers.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Andre and Champaign’s online relationship took off, but she must admit that she’s actually a he! Shane will marry Michelle, but he’s been fulfilling his fantasy with a Dominatrix! Brandy’s wild job now involves her sister’s boyfriend!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Fists fly when Cee Cee proposes to her boyfriend on the show; old flames come out of the woodwork to profess their love for Summer; Jon confesses a shocking secret to the woman he wants to marry.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Paris began prostituting at 11 years old and has continued for the last 10 years. She says she didn't like living by her moms rules so she left home and turned to prostitution to make money and take care of herself. Special guest host, Steve Wilkos is here to help her turn her life around.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Jennison is here to break up Scooter's marriage. Next Jana thinks her boyfriend is cheating, so she invited our cameras to join her when she confronted him at his home. A search of his house revealed another woman in the closet Jana's twin sister!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Fred deceived his lover, Jay, so now Jay is holding Fred gets revenge. Next Terry's obsession over his stuffed panda, Yogi, is about to drive his girlfriend out of his life! Then Benny will tell his buddy that he secretly wears women's underwear.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Nick is here to tell his soon to be wife Ashley that he's been cheating on her with two different women! Plus, Shea is here and worried sick that her husband Adam may have had a little too much fun on a recent trip the couple took together.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Dustin admits to cheating on his partner with his middle-school crush; psychic Nana says she has a premonition that her fiance is sleeping with her friend; Desiree believes that another woman is contending with her over her boyfriend.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Antiatte's friend and sister determine whether she will accept her boyfriend's marriage proposal; two women battle it out for a porn star's love; Britanny says something is fishy about her boyfriend's behavior.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Brady proposes to his ex-girlfriend, then she learns he cheated with her friend; Dillon feels he has to come clean about an advance he made toward his fiancee's friend.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Lynne kicked her husband out for cheating and now he's living in her front yard in a box! Next Sam says he's always wanted to see 2 women sleep together so he made a peculiar agreement with his cousin.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: After Marcus got out of prison, he found his calling with the lord and quickly established himself as a minister. But he hasn't exactly freed himself of trouble, because he's been sleeping with two women, Nay and Strawberry!
